segment.source: How to use the Connection Settings page in IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to import and preset connection settings on your employee’s computers.
segment.target: How to use the Connection Settings page in IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to import and preset connection settings on your employee’s computers.

segment.source: Use the Connection Settings page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Use the Connection Settings page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Use the Connection Settings page in the IEAK 11 Wizard
segment.target: Use the Connection Settings page in the IEAK 11 Wizard

segment.source: The Connection Settings page of the Internet Explorer Administration Kit (IEAK 11) Customization Wizard lets you import the connection settings from your computer, to preset the connection settings on your employee’s computers.
segment.target: The Connection Settings page of the Internet Explorer Administration Kit (IEAK 11) Customization Wizard lets you import the connection settings from your computer, to preset the connection settings on your employee’s computers.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: Using the options on the Additional Settings page of the wizard, you can let your employees change their connection settings.
segment.target: Using the options on the Additional Settings page of the wizard, you can let your employees change their connection settings.

segment.source: For more information see the Additional Settings page.
segment.target: For more information see the Additional Settings page.

segment.source: You can also customize additional connection settings using the Automatic Configuration page in the wizard.
segment.target: You can also customize additional connection settings using the Automatic Configuration page in the wizard.

segment.source: For more information see the Automatic Configuration page.
segment.target: For more information see the Automatic Configuration page.

segment.source: To view your current connection settings
segment.target: To view your current connection settings

segment.source: Open IE, click the Tools menu, click Internet Options, and then click the Connections tab.
segment.target: Open IE, click the Tools menu, click Internet Options, and then click the Connections tab.

segment.source: Click Settings to view your dial-up settings and click LAN Settings to view your network settings.
segment.target: Click Settings to view your dial-up settings and click LAN Settings to view your network settings.

segment.source: To use the Connection Settings page
segment.target: To use the Connection Settings page

segment.source: Decide if you want to customize your connection settings.
segment.target: Decide if you want to customize your connection settings.

segment.source: You can pick:
segment.target: You can pick:

segment.source: Do not customize Connection Settings.
segment.target: Do not customize Connection Settings.

segment.source: Pick this option if you don’t want to preset your employee’s connection settings.
segment.target: Pick this option if you don’t want to preset your employee’s connection settings.

segment.source: Import the current Connection Settings from this machine.
segment.target: Import the current Connection Settings from this machine.

segment.source: Pick this option to import your connection settings from your computer and use them as the preset for your employee’s connection settings.
segment.target: Pick this option to import your connection settings from your computer and use them as the preset for your employee’s connection settings.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: If you want to change any of your settings later, you can click Modify Settings to open the Internet Properties box, click the Connection Settings tab, and make your changes.
segment.target: If you want to change any of your settings later, you can click Modify Settings to open the Internet Properties box, click the Connection Settings tab, and make your changes.

segment.source: Check the Delete existing Dial-up Connection Settings box to clear any existing settings on your employee’s computers.
segment.target: Check the Delete existing Dial-up Connection Settings box to clear any existing settings on your employee’s computers.

segment.source: Click Next to go to the Automatic Configuration page or Back to go to the Connection Manager page.
segment.target: Click Next to go to the Automatic Configuration page or Back to go to the Connection Manager page.
